properties.graph_query: match(node('system', name='system', system_id=not_none(), deploy_mode='deploy').out('interface_map').node('interface_map').out('device_profile').node('device_profile',name='device_type_node').where(lambda device_type_node: 'leaf'.lower() in device_type_node.label.lower()))
